author: quintonm
msg: - The classloader passed in from Plexus is no longer used.  The classloader used to load the
- The current workign directory is now obtained from the context using the ComponentAppRoot key.
- Replaced called to System.out with logging calls.

author: quintonm
msg: No reason to keep the handlers in the component version.  These have been deprecated

author: quintonm
msg: The maven build process from Fulcrum no longer builda a single jar file for
Fulcrum.  I have changed it to match the build process for plexus-components
which uses the reactor to build a jar for each component.
At the moment, xmlrpc is all that will build.  The other parts of Fulcrum
will be converted in the near future.
